abstract: Azerbaijani State Oil Company fails to extinguish blaze on its rig in Caspian Sea, heightening risk of spill; 29 workers are missing and presumed dead after lifeboat they attempted to escape in capsized.
lead_paragraph: Workers have been evacuated, but one of two lifeboats capsized in rough seas, leaving 29 people missing and presumed dead.

headline.main: Caspian Sea Oil Rig Continues to Burn, Heightening Risk of Spill
headline.print_headline: Spill Risk Rises as Oil Rig Fire in Caspian Sea Enters 4th Day

snippet: Workers have been evacuated, but one of two lifeboats capsized in rough seas, leaving 29 people missing and presumed dead.
